participant_1.background:
I like to take drives in the country.
I love to go out to eat with my family.
I like to chat with my friends.
I like to go to the movies.

participant_2.background:
I take the subway to work everyday.
Every fall i visit my sister in canada.
I have four cats.
I m afraid of clowns.

content.text: Hi! I like to take drives in the country. What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I take the subway to work everyday. I also like to visit my sister in Canada every fall. What about you?
I love to go out to eat with my family. I also like to chat with my friends and go to the movies.
That sounds like fun! I love going to the movies too. I also like to read and write.
I like reading too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and romance novels.
I like those too! I also like to read mystery novels.
Oh, I love mystery novels too! I'm always trying to figure out who the killer is.
Me too! It's so much fun to try to solve the mystery before the author reveals it.
I agree! It's a great way to pass the time.
I think so too! So, what are you reading right now?
I'm reading a historical fiction novel about the American Revolution. It's really good so far.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've never read a historical fiction novel about the American Revolution.
You should! It's a great way to learn about the history of our country.
I think I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
